rubrics.requirements: Git Credential Helper Protocol Implementation and Core Execution Flow

sub_tasks.requirements: Git credential helper command implementation
Implements the 'get' command to find and return a credential for a given remote URL
Implements the 'store' command to persist a credential provided by Git
Implements the 'erase' command to delete a stored credential for a given remote URL
Git configuration system integration
Provides a 'configure' command to set itself as the system-wide or user-specific credential helper in Git's configuration
Provides an 'unconfigure' command to remove its configuration from Git
Command context and request processing
Parses input from Git (protocol, host, path) to understand the credential request
Loads system configuration to inform the execution flow
Executes an asynchronous, pipeline-based architecture for processing commands
